snippet.title: M.A.X.: Mechanized Assault and Exploration gameplay (PC Game, 1996)
snippet.description:
Gameplay for M.A.X.: Mechanized Assault and Exploration, Dos PC game produced by Interplay in 1996 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/max-mechanized-assault-and-exploration/6374/
Interesting take on 4X kind of games, MAX mixes exploration and expansion with a blend of real time and turn based strategy at the same time.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Dune 2 - https://youtu.be/4NNyYTPYO3k
Command & Conquer - https://youtu.be/g8BpkajvBjI
Battle Isle - https://youtu.be/73N6s0V_3lU
